slice.configuration.title: Slice
slice.configuration.category.display.too: Options for the visual appearance of the menu.
slice.configuration.category.display.siz: Options for adjusting the size of UI elements.
slice.configuration.display.size.radialM: Radius of the radial menu in pixels (distance from the center of the screen).
slice.configuration.display.size.itemSiz: Size of each item slot in the radial menu.
slice.configuration.display.size.slotSiz: Size of the slot background texture.
slice.configuration.display.visibility.b: Controls how visible the background color is when the menu is open.
slice.configuration.display.visibility.h: When enabled, empty slots in the radial menu will be hidden.
When enabled, slot numbers will not be displayed in the radial menu.
When enabled, slot sprites will not be displayed.
slice.configuration.category.display.vis: Options to disable specific slots from appearing in the menu.
slice.configuration.display.visibility.d: When enabled, slot 1 will not be displayed in the menu.
When enabled, slot 2 will not be displayed in the menu.
When enabled, slot 3 will not be displayed in the menu.
When enabled, slot 4 will not be displayed in the menu.
When enabled, slot 5 will not be displayed in the menu.
When enabled, slot 6 will not be displayed in the menu.
When enabled, slot 7 will not be displayed in the menu.
When enabled, slot 8 will not be displayed in the menu.
When enabled, slot 9 will not be displayed in the menu.
slice.configuration.display.maxAngle.too: The starting angle from which the menu begins drawing. If set to the same value as End Angle, the menu will span a full 360 degrees.
slice.configuration.display.endAngle.too: The ending angle at which the menu stops drawing. If set to the same value as Start Angle, the menu will span a full 360 degrees.
slice.configuration.display.counterclock: When enabled, the radial menu will reverse its slot order (9th slot â†’ 1st slot).
slice.configuration.category.behaviour.t: Options for changing how the mod behaves during gameplay.
slice.configuration.behaviour.toggleKeyb: When enabled, pressing the "Open menu" key will toggle the menu on and off (no need to hold the key).
slice.configuration.behaviour.clickToSel: When enabled, you must click on a slot to select it, rather than just releasing the button.
slice.configuration.behaviour.recenterOn: When enabled (requires 'Click to Select' to also be enabled), clicking a slot will recenter the cursor to the center of the menu.
slice.configuration.behaviour.closeOnSel: When enabled, selecting a slot will close the menu if "Click to Select" is enabled.
slice.configuration.behaviour.innerDeadz: Extends the selectable area inward from the menu radius. Increase this to require moving the mouse farther from the center before slots can be selected.
slice.configuration.behaviour.outerDeadz: Extends the selectable area outward from the menu radius. Increase this to require keeping the mouse closer to the menu for slot selection.
slice.configuration.misc.disableScrollin: Disable mouse wheel scrolling for the hotbar.
